subSubSection.paragraph:
BURUNDI : 1 ♀ [SB],
Giserama, Colline

Kigamba

Mabaye [= Mabayi ]

Mumushwizi Valley
, 23 Aug. 1993 , leg. Jay L. Udelhoven ( FMNH : 155942).
